titleStmt.title: Louers made men A masque presented in the house of the Right Honorable the Lord Haye. By diuers of noble qualitie, his friends. For the entertaynment of Monsieur Le Baron de Tour, extraordinarie ambassador for the French King. On Saterday the 22. of February. 1617.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
